skills.name: Slash
skills.description: A quick slash with a sword.

skills.name: Cleave
skills.description: A powerful cleave that hits all enemies.

skills.name: Shield Bash

effect.name: Stun
effect.description: Reduces target's speed by 2 for 3 turns.

skills.description: Bashes the enemy with a shield, potentially stunning them.

skills.name: Battle Cry
skills.description: A fierce cry that increases the warrior's strength.

skills.name: Defensive Stance
skills.description: A defensive stance that increases vitality.

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: A powerful attack that decreases the warrior's vitality.

skills.name: Taunt

effect.name: Weaken
effect.description: Reduces target's strength by 2 for 3 turns.

skills.description: Taunts the enemy, reducing their strength.

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: A spinning attack that hits all enemies.

skills.name: Charge

effect.name: Slow
effect.description: Reduces target's speed by 2 for 3 turns.

skills.description: Charges at the enemy, reducing their speed.

skills.name: Last Stand
skills.description: A powerful attack that increases vitality in desperation.
